entry.title: [EU/CA][LogsDataPlatform] - TLS 1.3 by default
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 15, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 16, 09:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/03/2023 13:00 UTC
End time : 15/03/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : None, except if you do not support TLS 1.3.
Service improvement: Following our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an internal maintenance to enable TLS 1.3 by default on Logs Data Platform.

The cipher suites supported after this maintenance will be :
* TLS 1.2 Cipher Suites:
The server accepted the following 3 cipher suites:
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: prime256v1 (256 bits)
* TLS 1.3 Cipher Suites:
TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 256 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 128 ECDH: X25519 (253 bits)
